title: OKITSURA: Fell in Love with an Okinawan Girl, but I Just Wish I Know What She's Saying
overview: When Teruaki Nakamura transfers to laid-back Okinawa, he falls for the lively Kyan-sanâ€”but her dialect is a complete mystery to him. With Higa-san translating, Teru's misunderstanding-filled island life takes off...and subtle hints suggest Higa-san might want his heart too. On this serene island, love flows as freely as the ocean breeze!
